ELEMENT.CREATOR: STAFF
ELEMENT.TITLE: Stacked Pics
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: Bold Welcome Message Detail Message IMAGE2 (150x150) IMAGE3 (150x150) IMAGEe (310x310) Product Listing Welcome Message
ELEMENT.SHORT: Large photo on left with two smaller photos stacked on the right. Use the larger space to show people in action, and the smaller boxes for product display.

ELEMENT.HELP: Please enter the first picture for your homepage.
Please enter the second picture for your homepage.
Please enter the third picture for your homepage.
Please enter a single line greeting that will appear in bold.
Please enter a Welcome message that will appear on your front page
ELEMENT.DEFAULT: Hello, welcome to our wonderful website!
ELEMENT.HELPER: Remember to keep this text short and to the point. If this is too long, or not helpful visitors probably won't go any further. A lot of businesses talk about what makes their products unique, or their excellent customer service. If you have neither of those, then consider simply welcoming the customer.

ELEMENT.HELP: You can add products to your homepage, when you do they will appear below.
The detail message will typically describe the pictures above.
ELEMENT.HELPER: Extra information if you need it.
ELEMENT.DEFAULT: Detailed information about policies or products
